entry.def: When someone perambulates, they walk about for pleasure.

means.word_mean: 1. a walk around a territory (a parish or manor or forrest etc.) in order to officially assert and record its boundaries
2. a leisurely walk (usually in some public place)

auth_sentence.content: Within the perambulation there are 30,900 acres of heathland.
